message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $11,000 represents a fair price given its value, I could meet you at $10,000.  This is my final offer.
I understand, Alice. I'm willing to come up a little. How about $9,500?
